thread.title: Jenna Jameson slams Muslims, defends KKK in Twitter rant
thread.title_full: Jenna Jameson slams Muslims, defends KKK in Twitter rant | Daily Telegraph

author: Jackie Salo
title: Jenna Jameson slams Muslims, defends KKK in Twitter rant
text:
JENNA Jameson has gone off on yet another anti-Muslim Twitter tirade, and this time she also bizarrely defended the Ku Klux Klan.
The ex-porn star’s rant began yesterday when she tweeted claims about the existence of “Muslim rape gangs.”
media_camera Jenna Jameson has defended the KKK on Twitter. Picture: Eddie Malluk/WireImage for Rose Tours
When other users fired back, she called them “sympathisers” and continued to double down on what she said was a “Muslim rape epidemic”, The New York Post reports.
“I disagree with absolutely everything they represent, and I am utterly unafraid to express my opinion,” Jameson tweeted.
The hours-long rant then took another strange turn when Jameson — who converted from Catholicism to Judaism after her engagement to Israeli jeweller Lior Bitton — defended the Ku Klux Klan.
“Do the klu klux klan follow a religion that orders the death of apostates? When was the last time we saw a klan member blow up infidels?” she tweeted.
media_camera Ex-porn star Jenna Jameson is pregnant and due to give birth in April. Picture: Splash News
The 42-year-old, who is due to give birth in April, has lashed out at Muslims before. In January, she drew fire for tweeting that Islam “promotes child rape, female genital mutilation, butchering non believers and polygamy”.
“I’m not sure I expected Jenna Jameson to be totally ‘woke’ but these tweets are … bad,” fired back one Twitter user.
media_camera Jenna Jameson with Donald Trump at the UFC 84 Light Heavyweight fight at the MGM Grand Garden Arena in Las Vegas in 2008. Picture: AP Photo/Eric Jamison)
Meanwhile, in December the ex-adult film star got into a social media tiff with former KKK leader David Duke.
This story originally appeared in The New York Post and as been republished here with permission.
 Ex-porn star’s bizarre KKK rant
